tiles.title: All customers of AMA & MMA/OMS by avg daily count

query.text:
//Top customers OMS/MMA by AgentId Count
let NewestMMA = toscalar(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('BI').WinMMACustomerWeeklySnapshot
    | where TblVer == 4
    | project Date
    | top 1 by Date );
let MMA_cust_pop =
union cluster("genevaagent.kusto.windows.net").database("BI").LnxOMSCustomerWeeklySnapshot, 
      cluster("genevaagent.kusto.windows.net").database("BI").WinMMACustomerWeeklySnapshot
| where TblVer == 4
| where Date == NewestMMA
| summarize Total_MMA_OMS_Pop = sum(Population)//, 
            //Win_MMA_Pop = sumif(Population,OsType has "windows"),
            //Lnx_MMA_Pop = sumif(Population,OsType !has "windows")
            by Customer
;
let NewestAMA = toscalar(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('BI').WinAMACustomerWeeklySnapshot
    | where TblVer == 4
    | project Date
    | top 1 by Date );
let AMA_cust_pop =
union cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('BI').WinAMACustomerWeeklySnapshot, 
      cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('BI').LnxAMACustomerWeeklySnapshot
| where TblVer == 4
| where Date == NewestAMA
| summarize Total_AMA_Pop = sum(Population) by Customer
//| top 2000 by Total_AMA_Pop
;
AMA_cust_pop
| join kind=fullouter MMA_cust_pop on Customer
| project-away Customer1
| extend Total_MMA_OMS_Pop = iff(isempty(Total_MMA_OMS_Pop),0.0,Total_MMA_OMS_Pop)
| extend Total_AMA_Pop = iff(isempty(Total_AMA_Pop),0.0,Total_AMA_Pop)
| extend Percent_Migrated = round((Total_AMA_Pop/(Total_AMA_Pop + Total_MMA_OMS_Pop))*100,2)
| sort by Total_AMA_Pop desc
| project-reorder Customer, Total_AMA_Pop, Total_MMA_OMS_Pop, Percent_Migrated

tiles.title: Total AMA Population of Selected Customer

query.text:
//Customer SubscriptionIds in AMA by Population
let Newest = toscalar(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('BI').WinAMACustomerWeeklySnapshot
    | where TblVer == 4
    | project Date
    | top 1 by Date );
let AMA_Daily =
union cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('BI').WinAMACustomerWeeklySnapshot, 
      cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('BI').LnxAMACustomerWeeklySnapshot
| where TblVer == 4
| where Date == Newest
| where isempty(['CustomerNameSelect_Field']) or Customer == ['CustomerNameSelect_Field']
| project Customer, SubscriptionId, Population, InternalOrExternal
| sort by Population desc
;
AMA_Daily
| summarize Total_AMA_Pop = sum(Population)

tiles.title: Total MMA/OMS Population of Selected Customer

query.text:
//Customer SubscriptionIds in MMA/OMS by Population
let Newest = toscalar(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('BI').WinMMACustomerWeeklySnapshot
    | where TblVer == 4
    | project Date
    | top 1 by Date );
let MMAOMS_Daily =
union cluster("genevaagent.kusto.windows.net").database("BI").LnxOMSCustomerWeeklySnapshot, 
      cluster("genevaagent.kusto.windows.net").database("BI").WinMMACustomerWeeklySnapshot
| where TblVer == 4
| where Date == Newest
| where isempty(['CustomerNameSelect_Field']) or Customer == ['CustomerNameSelect_Field']
| project Customer, SubscriptionId, Population, InternalOrExternal, Solutions
| sort by Population desc
;
MMAOMS_Daily
| summarize Total_MMAOMS_Pop = sum(Population)

tiles.title: Trend of MMA/OMS & AMA Population of Selected Customer

query.text:
//Trend of MMA/OMS & AMA Population of Customer
let MMAOMS_Daily =
union cluster("genevaagent.kusto.windows.net").database("BI").LnxOMSCustomerWeeklySnapshot, 
      cluster("genevaagent.kusto.windows.net").database("BI").WinMMACustomerWeeklySnapshot
| where TblVer == 4
| where isempty(['CustomerNameSelect_Field']) or Customer == ['CustomerNameSelect_Field']
| project Date, Customer, SubscriptionId, Population, InternalOrExternal, Solutions
| sort by Population desc
| summarize Customer_Total_MMA_OMS_Pop = sum(Population) by Date
;
let AMA_Daily =
union cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('BI').WinAMACustomerWeeklySnapshot, 
      cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('BI').LnxAMACustomerWeeklySnapshot
| where TblVer == 4
| where isempty(['CustomerNameSelect_Field']) or Customer == ['CustomerNameSelect_Field']
| project Date, Customer, SubscriptionId, Population, InternalOrExternal
| sort by Population desc
| summarize Customer_Total_AMA_Pop = sum(Population) by Date
;
MMAOMS_Daily
| join kind=leftouter AMA_Daily on Date
| project-away Date1

tiles.title: Features used on OMS/MMA by Selected customer

query.text:
//Solutions used on MMA/OMS by number of agents
let MMAOMS_Newest = toscalar(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('BI').WinMMACustomerSolutionsWeeklySnapshot
    | where TblVer == 3
    | project Date
    | top 1 by Date );
let Customer_MMAOMS_Solutions =
union
    cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('BI').WinMMACustomerSolutionsWeeklySnapshot,
    cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('BI').LnxOMSCustomerSolutionsWeeklySnapshot
| where Date == MMAOMS_Newest
| where TblVer == 3
| where isempty(['CustomerNameSelect_Field']) or Customer == ['CustomerNameSelect_Field'] // Freetext filtering
| summarize SolutionPopulation = sum(Population) by GroupedSolution
| sort by SolutionPopulation desc
;
Customer_MMAOMS_Solutions

tiles.title: Extension distribution on AMA by Selected customer

query.text:
//Solutions used on AMA by number of agents
let AMA_Newest = toscalar(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('BI').WinAMACustomerSolutionsWeeklySnapshot
    | where TblVer == 8
    | project Date
    | top 1 by Date );
let Customer_AMA_Solutions =
union cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('BI').LnxAMACustomerSolutionsWeeklySnapshot,
cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('BI').WinAMACustomerSolutionsWeeklySnapshot
| where Date == AMA_Newest
| where TblVer == 8
| where isempty(['CustomerNameSelect_Field']) or Customer == ['CustomerNameSelect_Field'] // Freetext filtering
| extend GroupedSolution = iff(GroupedSolution == "None", "AMA extension only", GroupedSolution)
| summarize SolutionPopulation = sum(Population) by GroupedSolution
| sort by SolutionPopulation desc
;
Customer_AMA_Solutions

- right-click on one of the customer names in the charts above
- select cross-filter

tiles.title: Windows customers of AMA or MMA by avg daily count

query.text:
//Top customers MMA by AgentId Count
let NewestMMA = toscalar(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('BI').WinMMACustomerWeeklySnapshot
    | where TblVer == 4
    | project Date
    | top 1 by Date );
let MMA_cust_pop =
      cluster("genevaagent.kusto.windows.net").database("BI").WinMMACustomerWeeklySnapshot
| where TblVer == 4
| where Date == NewestMMA
| summarize MMA_Pop = sum(Population)
            by Customer
| sort by MMA_Pop desc 
;
let NewestAMA = toscalar(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('BI').WinAMACustomerWeeklySnapshot
    | where TblVer == 4
    | project Date
    | top 1 by Date );
let AMA_cust_pop =
union cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('BI').WinAMACustomerWeeklySnapshot
| where TblVer == 4
| where Date == NewestAMA
| summarize AMA_Pop = sum(Population) by Customer
;
MMA_cust_pop
| join kind=fullouter  AMA_cust_pop on Customer
| project-away Customer1
| extend MMA_Pop = iff(isempty(MMA_Pop),0.0,MMA_Pop)
| extend AMA_Pop = iff(isempty(AMA_Pop),0.0,AMA_Pop)
| extend Percent_Migrated = round((AMA_Pop/(AMA_Pop + MMA_Pop))*100,2)
| sort by AMA_Pop desc
| project-reorder Customer, AMA_Pop, MMA_Pop, Percent_Migrated

tiles.title: Linux customers of AMA or OMS by avg daily count

query.text:
//Linux customers of AMA or OMS by avg daily count
let NewestOMS = toscalar(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('BI').LnxOMSCustomerWeeklySnapshot
    | where TblVer == 4
    | project Date
    | top 1 by Date );
let OMS_cust_pop =
      cluster("genevaagent.kusto.windows.net").database("BI").LnxOMSCustomerWeeklySnapshot
| where TblVer == 4
| where Date == NewestOMS
| summarize OMS_Pop = sum(Population)
            by Customer
| sort by OMS_Pop desc 
;
let NewestAMA = toscalar(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('BI').LnxAMACustomerWeeklySnapshot
    | where TblVer == 4
    | project Date
    | top 1 by Date );
let AMA_cust_pop =
union cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('BI').LnxAMACustomerWeeklySnapshot
| where TblVer == 4
| where Date == NewestAMA
| summarize AMA_Pop = sum(Population) by Customer
;
OMS_cust_pop
| join kind=fullouter AMA_cust_pop on Customer
| project-away Customer1
| extend OMS_Pop = iff(isempty(OMS_Pop),0.0,OMS_Pop)
| extend AMA_Pop = iff(isempty(AMA_Pop),0.0,AMA_Pop)
| extend Percent_Migrated = round((AMA_Pop/(AMA_Pop + OMS_Pop))*100,2)
//| where AMA_Pop <= 0
| sort by AMA_Pop desc
| project-reorder Customer, AMA_Pop, OMS_Pop, Percent_Migrated
